title: Share in the Valley's Secrets - Explorer Set Card 5 of 14
content:
Revised text is highlighted.

Delete "Suffer fatigue equal to the number of obstacles exhausted this way."

Elder's notes: We want our 3-cost cards to feel particularly powerful, since you have to give up a lot to even include them in your deck. Exhausting all obstacles in play, without needing the additional fatigue cost, is a powerful ability that feels worthy of being a 3-cost card.
